entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 5:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
